attributes.action: RAFAC Cadet Brassard and PTS to remain as it is.
attributes.additional_details: So that the cadets have their uniforms as THEY want them.
attributes.background: Tell HQRAFAC that many cadets feel very disheartened that there qualifications are going to be removed from their uniform and how the cadets had voiced how they wanted the Brassard to look but HQRAFAC chose to change it anyways.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about RAFAC uniform are a matter for the Royal Air Force Air Cadets HQ, not the UK Government or Parliament.
